projects.name: Founder-Led Business Website
projects.description: Positioning-first website for a founder-led service business that turned inconsistent inquiries into confident inbound conversations.
projects.fullContent:
Founder-Led Business Website

Context: Founder-led service business in early growth stage with a functioning site and steady referrals, but inconsistent online inquiries.

The problem: The site looked fine, but it didn’t clearly explain what made the business different or guide visitors toward a conversation.

Our diagnosis: This wasn’t a traffic issue — it was a clarity and conversion problem.

What we focused on: Refining positioning, simplifying the message, and restructuring the website flow.

What we built: A clearer homepage narrative, focused service sections, and intentional call-to-actions.

Systems added: Lead capture and follow-up structured to reduce manual back-and-forth.

Outcome: The website became a tool for explanation and trust, not just presence. Inbound conversations now start with clearer context and better-fit leads.

Note: Full walkthrough shared privately during a Growth System Audit.

projects.name: Social Media + Campaign System
projects.description: Consistency and campaign structure that turned scattered posting into a clear path from content to inquiry for a referral-reliant business.
projects.fullContent:
Social Media + Campaign System

Context: Small business relying heavily on referrals and manual outreach with inconsistent, disconnected social activity.

The problem: Effort was high, but visibility didn’t translate into predictable inquiries.

Our diagnosis: No inbound structure — only isolated posting and campaigns.

What we focused on: Creating consistency, clarity of message, and a clear path from content to inquiry.

What we built: A content structure aligned with business goals and targeted campaigns to support it.

Systems added: Tracking and basic automation to handle responses and follow-ups.

Outcome: Visibility became intentional, and lead flow stopped depending entirely on manual effort.

Note: Details shared privately during a Growth System Audit.

projects.name: Internal Billing & Operations System
projects.description: Lightweight internal OS to end manual invoicing, tracking, and ops backlogs for a founder-run team.
projects.fullContent:
Internal Billing & Operations System

Context: Founder-run business managing invoices, tracking, and records manually, leading to delays and errors.

The problem: Operational work was consuming time meant for growth — the founder was the system.

Our diagnosis: Lack of a simple internal system and a single source of truth.

What we focused on: Reducing manual steps and creating one source of truth.

What we built: A custom billing and tracking tool tailored to the workflow.

Outcome: Operations became faster, clearer, and less dependent on memory.

Note: Internal systems are demonstrated privately.
